article: Apple unveiled new products today. The event focused on performance and sustainability. Analysts expect strong holiday sales. Some critics worry about rising prices.
reference: Apple launched new products; analysts expect strong sales despite price concerns.

article: The city council approved a new bike lane network. Supporters say it will reduce traffic and emissions. Some drivers complain about fewer parking spaces. Construction begins next month.
reference: City approves bike lanes to cut traffic and emissions; construction starts next month.
